meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>extreme</kanji> <kanji>south</kanji> is the extreme of south. It's about as south as you can go. That place is known as <vocabulary>Antarctica</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
